document.full_text: iraqi security contractors now try to imitate americans in their clothing, by wearing trousers with several outside pockets, half-length boots, dark sunglasses and rolled-up sleeves. sometimes, iraqis themselves cannot differentiate between an iraqi and an american.
document.title: at war: i want to walk like you, talk like you ...
